course.title: Build Responsive Real World Websites with HTML5 and CSS3
course.subtitle: The easiest way to learn modern web design, HTML5 and CSS3 step-by-step from scratch. Design AND code a huge project.

reviews.body: Muy buena la experiencia, un curso bastante completo. Solo mejoraria un poco la traduccion ya que en oportunidades muestra palabras que no son correctas.
The course goes above and beyond by not only teaching you the necessary skills to learn the basics of HTML5 and CSS3, but by also providing great resources to expand your knowledge and skills.

Great course. Some parts are currently a bit out of date (late 2020). I'm giving it nearly 5 stars anyway because it was a very easy course to engage with, it teaches all the important basics, and there is good support and a nice community. Also a course update is rumoured to be coming in 2021. Thanks Jonas.

This was very amazing for a novice like me. I am 100% satisfied and motivated to take other courses from Jonas.

I strongly recommen this course to anybody who is interested in webdesigning.

Thanks Udemy, thanks Jonas

This is one of the best HTML5 and CSS3 courses on the Internet.

Jonas is an amazing instructor- He explains all the topics really well together with excellent presentations.

You get to learn valuable knowledge about web development and web design. You'll learn all the theory stuff and then put them into practice on ONE BIG project. After finishing this course, you will understand the process of building a website- from idea/sketch to production.

This course was a very good start on my journey on the path of the web development field. I recommend this course for all of those out there who wants to learn HTML5 and CSS3 to build awesome web sites.

It was very detailed. I learned so much from this course. I started from a beginner with no prior knowledge of coding and now and can be confident to say that coding is very fun and exciting. It can be tough but it worths it.

This course has covered a lot of useful information for HTML5 and CSS3. However, the instructor should improve his ability to speak English better. Also, he should explain carefully every property of programming language for students, not just go through. Need more improvement for this course by careful explainations of everything !!!!!!!

I loved this course. It dove right in to what you need to learn. It taught you the basics of what you need to know for HTML and CSS so that you can start building your own websites right away. What I recommend is to watch bits and pieces of this course and as soon as you learn it, APPLY IT, that way you can commit what you learned to memory.

The material is quite dated and if you didn't take this course five years ago you're going to run into a lot of issues. Also, Jonas's assistant is quite lax in responding to inquiries regarding issues that arise. The Q&A section states it takes 48 hours to respond but it doesn't take long to realize that responses are done at his leisure. In fact, it's because of my last few interactions with his assistant that I won't be finishing.
Great to know about the various concepts of web development and clear cut view of how a webpage is developed as per the customer's expectatitons

I had a great time going through this course, and learned a really valuable skill, or at least the beginnings of one. The lessons were generally easy to follow and the overall output is great.

As a minus, a good chunk of the material is now outdated (now is December 2020), and I went through a few hours of sleuthing to determine updated resources and coding practices. A minor inconvenience in a great learning journey.

instructor.name: Jonas Schmedtmann
instructor.briefIntroduction:
Hi, I'm Jonas! I have been identified as one of Udemy's Top Instructors and all my premium courses have recently earned the best-selling status for outstanding performance and student satisfaction.

I'm a full-stack web developer and designer with a passion for building beautiful things from scratch. I've been building websites and apps since 2007 and also have a Master's degree in Engineering.

It was in college where I first discovered my passion for teaching and helping others by sharing all I knew. And that passion brought me to Udemy in 2015, where my students love the fact that I take the time to explain important concepts in a way that everyone can easily understand.

Do you want to learn how to build awesome websites with advanced HTML and CSS?

Looking for a complete JavaScript course that takes you from beginner to advanced developer?

Or maybe you want to build modern and fast back-end applications with Node.js?

Then don't waste your time with random tutorials or incomplete videos. All my courses are easy-to-follow, all-in-one packages that will take your skills to the next level.

These courses are exactly the courses I wish I had when I was first getting into web development!

So see for yourself, enroll in one of my courses (or all of them :D) and join my 500,000+ happy students today.
